solution_line_template: If Parker got ${parker_share} with a ratio of {parker_ratio}, then the unit share is ${parker_share}/{parker_ratio} = $<<{parker_share}/{parker_ratio}={unit_share}>>{unit_share}
Using the sharing ratio, Richie gets {richie_ratio} unit shares which total to {richie_ratio}*${unit_share} = $<<{richie_ratio}*{unit_share}={richie_share}>>{richie_share}
